top_stories.title: OpenAI bets big on audio as Silicon Valley declares war on screens
top_stories.description: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- is becoming an interface.
top_stories.author: Connie Loizos
top_stories.content: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- is becoming an interface.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis
top_stories.content: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]

top_stories.title: Move Beyond Chain-of-Thought with Chain-of-Draft on Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: This post explores Chain-of-Draft (CoD), an innovative prompting technique introduced in a Zoom AI Research paper Chain of Draft: Thinking Faster by Writing Less, that revolutionizes how models approach reasoning tasks. While Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting has been the go-to method for enhancing model reasoning, CoD offers a more efficient alternative that mirrors human problem-solving patterns—using concise, high-signal thinking steps rather than verbose explanations.
top_stories.author: Ahmed Raafat
top_stories.content: This post explores Chain-of-Draft (CoD), an innovative prompting technique introduced in a Zoom AI Research paper Chain of Draft: Thinking Faster by Writing Less, that revolutionizes how models approach reasoning tasks. While Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting has been the go-to method for enhancing model reasoning, CoD offers a more efficient alternative that mirrors human problem-solving patterns—using concise, high-signal thinking steps rather than verbose explanations.

top_stories.title: MINISFORUM and AMD Unite for AI-Powered Performance
top_stories.description: Together, MINISFORUM and AMD are transforming the landscape of intelligent computing, setting new standards for power, efficiency, and creativity. On December 10th, MINISFORUM and AMD are proud to announce a high-level AI Application Product Experience Event, “Leading Intelligent Computing, Renewing the Core for the Future,” in Beijing, China. This unique event, co-hosted... The post MINISFORUM and AMD Unite for AI-Powered Performance first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
